content.question: In The Federalist papers, James Madison expressed the view that political factions

choices.label: should be nurtured by a free nation
should play a minor role in any free nation
are central to the creation of a free nation
are undesirable but inevitable in a free nation
are necessary to control the masses in a free nation

content.answer: are undesirable but inevitable in a free nation

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Describe the argument, perspective, evidence, and reasoning presented in the source.
